data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_b2b38e9406ea0de0b866db7674feea0f.png

skilllist.skilldesc: Layla deals increased damage to enemies farther away from her (starting at 100% and increasing to 115% at 6 units away). This does not include Turrets.

Layla fires a Malefic Bomb in the target direction, dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the first enemy hit (can Crit).

Upon hitting an enemy, Layla's Basic Attacks and <font color="a6aafb">Void Projectile</font> gain extra range for 3s, and she gains 60% extra Movement Speed that decays over 1.2s. The duration of the Movement Speed boost is doubled if an enemy hero is hit.

Layla fires an orb of Malefic Energy at the target enemy that explodes on hit, dealing 170<font color="fba51f"> (+65% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to targets in the area and applying a <font color="a6aafb">Magic Mark</font> on them for 3s.
When Layla hits an enemy with a <font color="a6aafb">Magic Mark</font>, she deals 100<font color="fba51f"> (+35% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies and stuns them for 0.25s.

Layla fires a blast of Malefic Energy in the target direction, dealing 500<font color="fba51f"> (+150% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in a line.

<font color="a6aafb">Passive:</font> The range of Layla's <font color="a6aafb">Void Projectile</font> and Basic Attacks is increased by 0.6 units. Her sight range is also slightly increased each time this skill is upgraded.

data.name: Layla

__data.skilldesc: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain <Num1> extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for <Num2>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Gold Lane: Attack Speed & Crit, with good Movement Speed. Long range late game kiting.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+15% Extra Attack Speed
+16 Adaptive Attack
+5% Lifesteal

emblemskill.skilldesc: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage with Basic Attacks increases Movement Speed by 30% for 1.5s and restores 75-180 HP (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 8s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage with Basic Attacks increases Movement Speed by <%Num2> for <Num1>s and restores <Num3> HP (scales with level).########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num4>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage with Basic Attacks increases Movement Speed by 30% for 1.5s and restores 75-180 HP (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 8s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Frenzy: Critical strikes grant 20% Attack Speed for 2s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Frenzy: Critical strikes grant 20% Attack Speed for 2s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+20% Lifesteal
+40 Extra Physical Attack
+15% Extra Attack Speed
+20% Crit Chance

equiplist.equipskill1: Doom: Critical strikes grant 5% extra Physical Attack for 2s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Doom: Critical strikes grant 5% extra Physical Attack for 2s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40% Crit Damage
+65 Extra Physical Attack
+25% Crit Chance

equiplist.equipskill1: Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
equiplist.equipskill2: Malefic Energy: Increases Basic Attack range by 12%. When hitting a target, gains 10% Movement Speed for 0.5s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
Malefic Energy: Increases Basic Attack range by 12%. When hitting a target, gains 10% Movement Speed for 0.5s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).

equiplist.equipskill1: Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
equiplist.equipskill2: Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.

recommendmasterplan.name: JOLEE
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: The backbone of the Eruditio Rangers who is also known as the Shining Star.

assist.desc: Layla works best with Tanks that can protect backline heroes, such as Minsitthar and Belerick, since their protection gives Layla more opportunities to deal damage.

strong.desc: Layla's relatively longer attack range lets her counter slow Tanks like Tigreal and Belerick.

weak.desc: Layla is countered by Assassins with high burst damage, such as Karina and Ling, as they can get the jump on Layla and melt her easily.
